nrqlQueries.query: SELECT average(duration) FROM PageView  since 1 day ago  FACET appName TIMESERIES

widgets.title: What Cities Are My Users In?

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT count(*) FROM PageView since 1 day ago FACET  city
SELECT count(*) FROM PageView since 1 days ago facet userAgentName, userAgentOS

SELECT percentage(uniqueCount(session), WHERE userAgentName = 'IE') AS '% of IE Users', percentage(uniqueCount(session), WHERE userAgentName = 'Chrome') AS '% of Chrome Users', percentage(uniqueCount(session), WHERE userAgentName = 'Firefox') AS '% of Firefox Users', percentage(uniqueCount(session), WHERE userAgentName = 'Safari') AS '% of Safari Users' FROM PageView SINCE 1 day ago

SELECT percentage(count(*), WHERE largestContentfulPaint < 2.5) AS 'good (< 2.5)', percentage(count(*), WHERE largestContentfulPaint >= 2.5 and largestContentfulPaint < 4) AS 'needs improvement (>= 2.5 < 4)', percentage(count(*), WHERE largestContentfulPaint >= 4) AS 'poor (>=4)' FROM PageViewTiming WHERE timingName = 'largestContentfulPaint' SINCE 1 week ago

SELECT percentage(count(*), WHERE largestContentfulPaint < 2.5) AS 'good (< 2.5)', percentage(count(*), WHERE largestContentfulPaint >= 2.5 and largestContentfulPaint < 4) AS 'needs improvement (>= 2.5 < 4)', percentage(count(*), WHERE largestContentfulPaint >= 4) AS 'poor (>=4)' FROM PageViewTiming WHERE  timingName = 'largestContentfulPaint' SINCE 1 week ago TIMESERIES
SELECT percentile(firstInputDelay, 75) FROM PageViewTiming WHERE timingName = 'firstInteraction' FACET appName  SINCE 1 day ago COMPARE WITH 1 week ago
SELECT percentile(cumulativeLayoutShift, 75) FROM PageViewTiming  WHERE cumulativeLayoutShift IS NOT NULL AND timingName = 'pageHide' FACET appName SINCE 1 day ago COMPARE WITH 1 week ago
SELECT percentile(largestContentfulPaint, 75) FROM PageViewTiming WHERE timingName = 'largestContentfulPaint' FACET appName SINCE 1 day ago COMPARE WITH 1 week ago

SELECT percentage(count(*), WHERE cumulativeLayoutShift < 0.1) AS 'good (< 0.1)', percentage(count(*), WHERE cumulativeLayoutShift >= 0.1 AND cumulativeLayoutShift < 0.25) AS 'needs improvement (>= 0.1 < 0.25)', percentage(count(*), WHERE cumulativeLayoutShift >= 0.25) AS 'poor (>=0.25)'  FROM PageViewTiming WHERE cumulativeLayoutShift IS NOT NULL AND timingName = 'pageHide' SINCE 1 week ago

SELECT percentage(count(*), WHERE cumulativeLayoutShift < 0.1) AS 'good (< 0.1)', percentage(count(*), WHERE cumulativeLayoutShift >= 0.1 AND cumulativeLayoutShift < 0.25) AS 'needs improvement (>= 0.1 < 0.25)', percentage(count(*), WHERE cumulativeLayoutShift >= 0.25) AS 'poor (>=0.25)'  FROM PageViewTiming WHERE cumulativeLayoutShift IS NOT NULL AND timingName = 'pageHide'  TIMESERIES SINCE 1 week ago
SELECT percentile(largestContentfulPaint, 75), percentile(largestContentfulPaint, 95), percentile(largestContentfulPaint, 99) FROM PageViewTiming WHERE timingName = 'largestContentfulPaint'

SELECT percentile(cumulativeLayoutShift, 75), percentile(cumulativeLayoutShift, 95), percentile(cumulativeLayoutShift, 99) FROM PageViewTiming WHERE cumulativeLayoutShift IS NOT NULL AND timingName = 'pageHide'
SELECT percentile(firstInputDelay, 75), percentile(firstInputDelay, 95), percentile(firstInputDelay, 99) FROM PageViewTiming WHERE timingName = 'firstInteraction'

SELECT percentage(count(*), WHERE firstInputDelay < 100) AS 'good (<100ms)', percentage(count(*), WHERE firstInputDelay >= 100 and firstInputDelay < 300) AS 'needs improvement (>=100 <300ms)', percentage(count(*), WHERE firstInputDelay >= 300) AS 'poor (> 300ms)' FROM PageViewTiming WHERE firstInputDelay IS NOT NULL since 1 week ago

SELECT percentage(count(*), WHERE firstInputDelay < 100) AS 'good (<100ms)', percentage(count(*), WHERE firstInputDelay >= 100 and firstInputDelay < 300) AS 'needs improvement (>=100 <300ms)', percentage(count(*), WHERE firstInputDelay >= 300) AS 'poor (> 300ms)' FROM PageViewTiming WHERE firstInputDelay IS NOT NULL since 1 week ago TIMESERIES
SELECT percentile(firstContentfulPaint, 75) as 'First Contentful Paint' FROM PageViewTiming
SELECT percentile(pageHide, 75) FROM PageViewTiming SINCE 1 day ago
SELECT percentile(firstInputDelay, 75) FROM PageViewTiming WHERE timingName = 'firstInteraction' FACET interactionType LIMIT max

widgets.title: Click to Filter to Transaction Name

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT percentile(firstContentfulPaint, 75), percentile(largestContentfulPaint, 75), percentile(firstInputDelay, 75), max(firstInputDelay), filter(percentile(cumulativeLayoutShift, 75), WHERE timingName = 'pageHide') as 'Cumulative Layout Shift', percentile(pageHide, 75) FROM PageViewTiming  FACET browserTransactionName LIMIT 50
FROM PageViewTiming SELECT histogram(firstInputDelay, 1000, 10) SINCE 3 hours ago
FROM PageViewTiming SELECT histogram(cumulativeLayoutShift, 1, 40) WHERE timingName = 'pageHide' SINCE 3 hours ago

rawConfiguration.text:
# Digital Customer Experience (DCX)
---
Where do you start on your DCX journey? Start by:  
1. Instrumenting end-to-end: **front-end**, your **apps**, your infrastructure, and your **availability** through synthetic monitoring
2. Fixing obvious problems,
3. Identifying performance and availability SLIs, and establish baselines,  
4. Setting SLOs, and configuring alerts.
## Golden Signals: 1. Errors, 2. Traffic, 3. Latency, and 4. Saturation

# Browser Facets
To drill down to specific areas of interest:

1. Use search field on top of the page
2. Click on application, browser, city, country, domain, OS, or popular page for other widgets to adjust

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT count(*) FROM PageView since 1 day ago FACET  countryCode
SELECT count(*) FROM PageView since 1 day ago FACET userAgentName

widgets.title: How many users does the applications have?

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT uniqueCount(session) FROM PageView since 60 minute ago until 10 seconds ago COMPARE WITH 1 hour ago
SELECT count(*) FROM PageView since 1 day ago FACET city
SELECT count(*) FROM PageView since 1 day ago FACET userAgentOS

rawConfiguration.text:
## SRE Golden Signal 1: Errors - Fix known errors
**APM**  
 - Top errors by APM app  
 - Error rate by APM app over time  
**Browser**,  
 - Top JavaScript Errors by URI **(not shown, needs Pro configuration)**  
 - JavaScript Errors by URI over time **(not shown, needs Pro configuration)**  
**Synthetics**  
 - Monitor (un)availability over time  
 - Monitor (un)availability and type by most unavailable  
 - Error Budget **(not shown)**

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT count(*) from TransactionError facet `error.message` since 1 day ago
SELECT count(*) from TransactionError facet appName TIMESERIES auto since 1 day ago

widgets.title: Errors: Synthetics Unavailability % over time (by Monitor)

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT percentage(count(*), WHERE result = 'FAILED') AS 'Unavailability %' From SyntheticCheck SINCE 1 month AGO FACET monitorName, typeLabel

widgets.title: Errors: Synthetics Unavailability % over time (by Monitor)

nrqlQueries.query: From SyntheticCheck SELECT percentage(count(*), WHERE result = 'FAILED') AS 'Unavailability %' SINCE 30 DAY AGO TIMESERIES AUTO FACET monitorName

rawConfiguration.text:
## SRE Golden Signal 2: Traffic - Throughput
Identify Service Level Indicators (SLIs) and establish baselines, set Service Level Objectives (SLOs)
  
**APM**  
 - Top Throughput by application  
 - Highest throughput over time by application  
**Browser**  
 - Highest number of sessions over time by application

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT count(*) FROM Transaction SINCE 1 DAY AGO FACET appName
SELECT count(*) FROM PageView FACET weekdayOf(timestamp) SINCE 7 days ago
SELECT uniqueCount(session) FROM PageView SINCE 1 day ago FACET appName TIMESERIES 15 minutes
SELECT count(*) FROM Transaction SINCE 1 DAY AGO FACET appName TIMESERIES AUTO

widgets.title: End user and app server performance

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT average(duration) as ' End User Time', average(backendDuration) as ' App Server Time ' FROM PageView SINCE 2 minutes ago UNTIL 10 seconds ago TIMESERIES
SELECT count(*) FROM PageView since 1 day ago FACET  pageUrl
SELECT histogram(duration) FROM PageView SINCE 1 day ago
SELECT count(*) FROM PageView since 1 day ago FACET domain
SELECT 3 as 'Good', 7 as 'OK', average(duration), percentile(duration, 50), percentile(duration, 67), percentile(duration, 95) from PageView TIMESERIES AUTO

rawConfiguration.text:
## SRE Golden Signal 3: Latency - Performance
  
Identify Service Level Indicators (SLIs) and establish baselines, set Service Level Objectives (SLOs)  
  
**APM**  
 - Highest latency of 2xx, 4xx, 5xx responses by app  
 - Most frustrating Apdex (0.5 T) by transaction  
**Browser**  
 - Most frustrating Apdex (3.0 T) by domain  
 - Time to first byte / Time to render (**needs Pro configuration**)  
**Synthetics**  
 - Slowest Average Resource

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT average(duration) FROM Transaction WHERE httpResponseCode = '200' since 1 day ago FACET appName TIMESERIES AUTO
SELECT average(duration) FROM Transaction WHERE httpResponseCode LIKE '4%' since 1 day ago FACET appName TIMESERIES AUTO
SELECT average(duration) FROM Transaction WHERE httpResponseCode LIKE '5%' since 1 day ago FACET appName TIMESERIES AUTO

widgets.title: Latency: Most Frustration Apdex (0.5 T) by APM Transaction

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT filter(count(*), WHERE duration > 2) AS Frustrating, filter(count(*), WHERE (duration > 0.5) AND (duration <= 2)) AS Tolerating, filter(count(*), WHERE duration <= 0.5) AS Satisfied, apdex(duration, 0.5), count(*) AS Total FROM Transaction FACET name LIMIT 20

widgets.title: Most Frustration Apdex (0.5 T) by APM Transaction

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT filter(count(*), WHERE duration > 2 OR error IS true) AS Frustrating FROM Transaction TIMESERIES FACET name LIMIT 10

widgets.title: Latency: Apdex (0.5 T) by Most Frustrated APM Transaction

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT filter(count(*), WHERE duration > 2 OR error IS true) AS Frustrating, filter(count(*), WHERE (duration > 0.5) AND (duration <= 2)) AS Tolerating, filter(count(*), WHERE duration <= 0.5) AS Satisfied, apdex(duration, 0.5), count(*) AS Total FROM Transaction  FACET name  LIMIT 20

widgets.title: Latency: Most Frustration Apdex (3.0 T) by Browser Domain

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT filter(count(*), WHERE duration > 12 OR error IS true) AS Frustrating, filter(count(*), WHERE (duration > 3) AND (duration <= 12)) AS Tolerating, filter(count(*), WHERE duration <= 3) AS Satisfied, apdex(duration, 3), count(*) AS Total FROM PageView WHERE domain NOT LIKE '%test%' FACET domain LIMIT 20

widgets.title: Most Frustration Apdex (3.0 T) by Browser Domain

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT filter(count(*), WHERE duration > 12 OR error IS true) AS Frustrating FROM PageView WHERE domain NOT LIKE '%test%' TIMESERIES FACET domain LIMIT 10

widgets.title: Latency: Apdex (3.0 T) by Most Frustrated Browser Domain

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT filter(count(*), WHERE duration > 12 OR error IS true) AS Frustrating, filter(count(*), WHERE (duration > 3) AND (duration <= 12)) AS Tolerating, filter(count(*), WHERE duration <= 3) AS Satisfied, filter(count(*), WHERE error IS true) as Errors, apdex(duration, 3), count(*) AS Total FROM PageView WHERE domain NOT LIKE '%test%' FACET domain
SELECT average(duration)/1000 AS 'Average Duration (Secs)' FROM SyntheticRequest FACET domain, monitorName, hierarchicalURL, contentType, isAjax, externalResource

rawConfiguration.text:
## SRE 4 Golden Signal 4: Saturation  
Identify Service Level Indicators (SLIs) and establish baselines, set Service Level Objectives (SLOs)  

**Infrastructure**  
 - Highest(/top) average CPU by host bar chart  
 - Highest(/top) average CPU by host over time  
 - Top 98th percentile disk utilization by host bar chart  
 - Top 98th percentile disk utilization by host over time

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT percentile(diskUtilizationPercent, 98) FROM SystemSample facet hostname since 1 hour ago
SELECT average(cpuPercent) FROM SystemSample TIMESERIES FACET entityName LIMIT 10 SINCE 60 minutes ago
SELECT average(cpuPercent) FROM SystemSample FACET entityName LIMIT 10 SINCE 60 minutes ago
SELECT percentile(diskUtilizationPercent, 98) FROM SystemSample timeseries facet hostname since 1 hour ago
SELECT count(*) from JavaScriptError FACET errorClass

widgets.title: JS Errors compared with past JS error trends

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT count(*) from JavaScriptError TIMESERIES AUTO compare with 1 week ago

SELECT count(*) from JavaScriptError FACET errorMessage
SELECT count(*) FROM JavaScriptError FACET browserInteractionId
SELECT count(*) FROM JavaScriptError FACET userAgentName
SELECT count(*) FROM JavaScriptError FACET userAgentOS
SELECT count(*) FROM JavaScriptError FACET deviceType
SELECT count(*) FROM JavaScriptError FACET requestUri

rawConfiguration.text:
![Image](https://newrelic.com/content/dam/component-assets/u03-navigation/logo-browser.svg)
* Use below charts to filter by Domain, Category, Device, Country or Browser
* Use calendar options on the right to filter
* Narrow results up to 1 URL from the URL Heatmap
* Compare funnels between slow & fast pages
* Compare Front-End vs Back-End Performance
* [Dive deeper into Real User Monitoring](https://rpm.newrelic.com/accounts/68957/browser)

SELECT average(networkDuration) as 'Network (sec)', average(backendDuration) as 'Backend Time (sec)',average(duration) as 'Page Load time (sec)' FROM PageView SINCE 1 day ago

SELECT average(timeToFetchStart) AS 'Request queueing', average(timeToResponseStart) AS 'First byte', average(firstPaint) as 'First paint', average(firstContentfulPaint) as 'First contentful paint', average(timeToDomContentLoadedEventEnd) AS 'DOM content loaded', average(timeToLoadEventEnd) AS 'Window load', average(duration) AS 'Window load + AJAX' FROM BrowserInteraction WHERE category = 'Initial page load' AND `mobileOptimized` IS NULL

SELECT average(timeToFetchStart) AS 'Request queueing', average(timeToResponseStart) AS 'First byte', average(firstPaint) as 'First paint', average(firstContentfulPaint) as 'First contentful paint', average(timeToDomContentLoadedEventEnd) AS 'DOM content loaded', average(timeToLoadEventEnd) AS 'Window load', average(duration) AS 'Window load + AJAX' FROM BrowserInteraction WHERE category = 'Initial page load' TIMESERIES
SELECT percentile(duration, 50, 90, 95), average(duration) FROM PageView since 1 day ago TIMESERIES

SELECT apdex(duration,t: 0.2) AS '' FROM Transaction   SINCE 1 day ago

SELECT apdex(duration,t: 2) AS '' FROM PageView  SINCE 1 day ago TIMESERIES
SELECT apdex(duration,t: 0.5) AS '' FROM Transaction   SINCE 1 day ago TIMESERIES
